text:
London, UK

★ Ruby On Rails Developer ★

Our startup SupaDupa.me (http://supadupa.me/) is seeking a talented Ruby on Rails developer.

Our stack is latest Rails,HAML,Rspec etc.

You would be working with some talented people on a high quality product with some interesting technical and user challenges at all levels.

I personally promise every day will be different :)

Shoot me an email jason@supadupa.me to discuss.
